docs.title: [something about getting distracted?]
docs.text:
Hello, I'm a silly person on the Internet, of dragons and bananas.

I'm on various platforms, such as:

  • Discord, as a__distraction
    • The "Nargacrewga" Discord
  • Matrix, as @a_distraction:matrix.org (though not using it much)
  • Steam, usually as "a distraction"
  • Stoat, as a_distraction#4964
  • Telegram as @Dresklaw
  • VRChat, as a distraction

I've done a number of silly things, such as:

  • forking to maintain ValheimPlayerModels, and getting such onto Thunderstore
  • maintaining the "TongueyToastacuga", which started with some minor modifications of Toastador's posted Toastacuga, but has grown somewhat over time
    • just to highlight, but in that "TongueyToastacuga" Google Drive, the "Misc" directory contains various related assets, such as Substance Painter files and the Blender file from which the Unitypackages were derived
  • miscellaneous other odds and ends of things that either aren't coming to mind, or I don't care to mention. :P
